verses.name: Luke 14:5
verses.text: And answered them, saying, Which of you shall have an ass or an ox fallen into a pit, and will not straightway pull him out on the sabbath day?

verses.name: Luke 14:6
verses.text: And they could not answer him again to these things.

verses.name: Luke 14:7
verses.text: And he put forth a parable to those which were bidden, when he marked how they chose out the chief rooms; saying unto them,

verses.name: Luke 14:8
verses.text: When thou art bidden of any man to a wedding, sit not down in the highest room; lest a more honourable man than thou be bidden of him;
